name: Impossible Bug Cards
description:
Watch the video for shorter gameplay( only for jam time if u want to have fun go the full way)

Impossible Bug Cards.

Card1-no gravity

Card2-no collision

Card3-(za war***) time stop

I challenge you to clear this hellishly difficult game if u'd rate dark souls difficulty to be 5 mine is 3 points so good luck!!

WASD-move

J-shoot(warning u can die to your own bullets)

quit- Alt+F4

Card1(active)-C

Card1(deactivate)-V

Card2- passive

Card3(toggle) - Z

Enemy are of 3 types displayed at level 1 observe them. Boss monsters are secret and wish u all to keep secret about them. Also especially the level 6 boss don't reveal it's secret to anyone. Stage 1: Head right to reach stage 2 its quite high but u can do it if u just spam 'w'

Stage2: Fall down and go to right corner. There is a wrong way but u will be fine as long as u fall down you can also reach infinity but stay sure to be in bounds of diagonal tiles. Figure out the mechanic on urself but remember to pick up card2 that is the only way to clear level 2 and further levels. You might be able to clear all levels without it that's completely upto you.

Stage3: Made by my friend its completely cleared on the video above.

Stage4: Boss 1(25 health) Secret mechanics

Stage5: Boss 2(50 health)  Secret mechanics

Stage 6: Boss 3 (150 health) (Hint is helpful if u get touhou references) I beg u please keep it a secret even if u cleared it. I will upload the clear on youtube tomorrow. So be sure to subscribe to my channel. Now I sound like some annoying youtuber whose channel name starts with J just kidding xD.
